welcome.subtitle: Let's get you started on your AI literacy journey [Chinese (Simplified)]

step1.title: Discover Your Path [Chinese (Simplified)]
step1.description: AI Square helps you understand and master AI literacy [Chinese (Simplified)]
step1.content: We'll help you identify your strengths and areas for growth through personalized assessments and guided learning experiences. [Chinese (Simplified)]
step1.assessmentDesc: Discover your current AI knowledge level [Chinese (Simplified)]
step1.learningDesc: Get tailored recommendations based on your goals [Chinese (Simplified)]

step2.title: Four Core Domains [Chinese (Simplified)]
step2.description: Master the essential areas of AI literacy [Chinese (Simplified)]
step2.content: Our comprehensive framework covers everything you need to know about working with AI effectively and responsibly. [Chinese (Simplified)]

step3.title: Start Your Journey [Chinese (Simplified)]
step3.description: Begin with an assessment and unlock your potential [Chinese (Simplified)]
step3.content: Ready to discover your AI literacy level and get personalized learning recommendations? [Chinese (Simplified)]
step3.benefit1: Detailed assessment of your AI knowledge [Chinese (Simplified)]
